ai-patthana15.43:0.2_0: Living in the teaching, they are included in the discourses and found, as it’s amazing.
ai-patthana15.43:0.3_0: Standing on the near shore, the far shore,
ai-patthana15.43:1.1_0: Being diligent, keen, and resolute is a cause of the mind.
ai-patthana15.43:1.1_1: ‘... for the sake of the three realms.’ ...
ai-patthana15.43:2.1_0: Being disillusioned, desire fades away. Since the mind is not deluded, the unskillful is a condition for the mind. ...
ai-patthana15.43:2.1_1: ‘... for the sake of the three realms.’ ...
ai-patthana15.43:2.1_3: (This should be expanded as for the three roots of the following.)
